extends AbstractLotSizingProblemGenerator

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public static NormalDistributedStochasticLotsizingProblem generate(int T,
                                                   double firstMean,
                                                   double lastMean,
                                                   double cv,
                                                   double setupCost,
                                                   double inventoryHoldingCost,
                                                   float alpha,
                                                   AbstractNormalLikeOrdersGenerator orderGenerator)
        Constructs a normal distributed problem. The first mean is the demand mean in the first period, the last mean is the mean in the last period. All means between will be linearly adjusted.
        Parameters:
        T - number of periods
        firstMean - demand mean
        lastMean - demand mean
        cv - demand coefficient of variance
        setupCost - constant setup costs
        inventoryHoldingCost - constant inventory holding costs
        alpha - alpha service level
        orderGenerator - the order generator
        Returns:
